lead_paragraph: Pope Francis’s divorce maneuvers show how Catholicism might shift on same-sex marriage.
snippet: Pope Francis’s divorce maneuvers show how Catholicism might shift on same-sex marriage....
abstract: Ross Douthat Op-Ed column describes how Pope Francis has been trying to reinvent Roman Catholic Church's stance on remarriage without sparking crisis in church, in face of resistance from conservatives; links Francis's circuitous efforts to those of Sen Tim Kaine, who has told limited audiences he expects church to eventually bless same-sex marriages; holds Francis's strategy of studied ambiguity and private hints at changes in doctrine is inherently unstable and makes it unlikely he will be remembered as a great conciliator or unifier.
